name: Run for Supplies - GMTK Jam 2021
description:
Fly from planet to planet to establish a stable resource network.

Look to your resources at the top left and try to prevent them from reaching zero.

What to do

Select your flight direction with the left mouse button. After landing select one of the available structures and build it. Structures require resources to build and people to work. Build outposts, colonies (tier 2) and cities (tier 3) to increase your population, but don't forget they will need food, water and energy. Balance resources and try to sustain your economy as long as possible. Also you can upgrade your ship to fly further and reach distant planets.

Controls
  • Left mouse button to choose flight direction
  • Space to pause or unpause

Unfortunatly there is no music in WebGL version, but you can download Windows version.
